DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate visual performance new multifocal High ADD contact lens compare currently-marketed AIR OPTIX® AQUA MULTIFOCAL ( AOAMF ) High ADD Contact Lens .
DOC.brief_title: Multifocal High ADD Contact Lens Proof Concept Trial
DOC.criteria: Must sign Informed Consent document ; Presbyopic require least 2.25 diopter ( D ) spectacle ADD power ; Current previous soft contact lens wearer ; Not able achieve monocular near visual acuity ( VA ) 0.2 logarithm Minimum Angle Resolution ( logMAR ) [ Early Treatment Diabetic Retinopathy Study ( ETDRS ) ] good eye AIR OPTIX® AQUA Multifocal ( AOAMF ) High ADD Contact Lenses ; Willing able wear multifocal contact lenses eye within available range power trial ; Manifest cylinder less equal 1.00 D ; Able achieve best correct visual acuity ( BCVA ) 20/25 good eye distance ( determine manifest refraction ) ; Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Any anterior segment infection , inflammation , disease , abnormality contraindicates contact lens wear within 6 month prior enrollment , determine investigator ; Any use systemic ocular medication contact lens wear could contraindicate , determined investigator ; use topical ocular medication would require instillation contact lens wear ; Any history herpetic keratitis ; History corneal refractive surgery , irregular cornea unilateral pseudophakia ; Biomicroscopy finding ( except corneal vascularization ) moderate ( Grade 3 ) severe ( Grade 4 ) ; Corneal vascularization mild ( Grade 2 ) high ; A pathologically dry eye precludes contact lens wear ; Monocular ( 1 eye functional vision ) ; Anisometropia ≥ 1.50 D ( contact lens distance prescription ) ; Clinically significant ( > 1 millimeter ) anisocoria ; History intolerance hypersensitivity component investigational product ; Concurrent participation contact lens contact lens care product clinical trial within previous 30 day ; Eye injury ocular intraocular surgery within 6 month prior enrollment ; Any ocular systemic medical condition may , opinion Investigator , preclude safe administration study lens affect result study ; Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
